Package: com.github.tagc.semver.version

[Groovy] Class Parser

    • com.github.tagc.semver.version.BaseVersion.Parser

    • Version parser - parses strings and constructs BaseVersion instances from them.

      Authors:
      davidfallah
      Since:
      0.2.1

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          BaseVersion parse(java.io.File inputFile, boolean strict = false)

      • Method Detail

        • BaseVersion parse(java.io.File inputFile, boolean strict = false)

          Parses the text within the given file and tries to construct an instance of Version from it.

          Returns:
          an instance of BaseVersion if the input could be parsed or null if it could not
          Parameters:
          inputFile - a file containing text that represents a version specifier
          strict - set true if the parse attempt should succeed only if the entire string can be parsed

        • BaseVersion parse(java.lang.String input, boolean strict = false)

          Parses the specified input string and tries to construct an instance of Version from it.

          Returns:
          an instance of BaseVersion if the input could be parsed or null if it could not
          Parameters:
          input - a string representing a version specifier
          strict - set true if the parse attempt should succeed only if the entire string can be parsed

        • java.lang.String parseAndReplace(java.io.File inputFile, boolean strict = false, Version newVersion)

          Parses the text within the file and replaces all occurrences of version data with new version data based on newVersion. This method will not modify the given file.

          Returns:
          a copy of the file's text with the replacements made, if any
          Parameters:
          inputFile - a file containing text that represents a version specifier
          newVersion - the version to replace the existing version data in the input with

        • java.lang.String parseAndReplace(java.lang.String input, boolean strict = false, Version newVersion)

          Parses the specified input string and replaces all occurrences of version data with new version data based on newVersion.

          Returns:
          a copy of the input string with the replacements made, if any
          Parameters:
          input - a string representing a version specifier
          newVersion - the version to replace the existing version data in the input with
